WorkItem.ClosedComment: asynchonosity issue, fixed on next click
WorkItem.Description: Sometimes, when loading a character, the icons go missing.  Attached, find the character file I'm using to test with, along with two separate screenshots showing the results of two different attempts at loading the character.  Note the missing icons in different places in each screenie.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Some icons go missing on character load

Comments.Message: Images get loaded asynchronously. The bug is that they don't always get refreshed when they finish downloading. Clicking on them forces them to refresh, right?

Unfortunately, no.  The images do not appear when I click on the box.  Now, the menu with all the items for that slot comes up, and the icons all appear correctly there, even the one that's equipped in that slot.

Actually changing an item makes _all_ of the missing icons appear, however.
